title: Environmental Literacy Development with Islamic Values: Project-Based Learning for Green Living

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Environmental Concepts and General Understanding of Islamic Values
context.additional_context: Elementary education-linked civic literacy program for general citizens in BYOD environments, emphasizing practical projects reflecting Islamic values

learning_goals: Learners can design Islamic value-based practical solutions for four subtopics: water conservation, soil protection, eco-friendly product usage, and waste recycling.
Learners derive problem-solving outcomes combining scientific inquiry skills and environmental literacy through project-based learning activities.
Learners apply effective communication and teamwork strategies within large groups using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
